ComicInfo.Title: Blood Divine, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: The most exciting new story line of the year continues as the Magdalena calls for reinforcements and sets out to hunt down the coven of vampires. Meanwhile, Cardinal Innocent finds out more about the origins of the ancient relics found by Father Jasper, including their connection to the Magdalena! Prepare yourself as the secret of the Magdalena is revealed!
